arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Man City eyeing move for Wirtz
arts.sum: Manchester City want Bayer Leverkusen attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz to replace Kevin De Bruyne, while Liverpool are interested in Barcelona center-back Ronald Araújo . - The "dream" option for Manchester City this summer is Bayer Leverkusen attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz, reports Fabrizio Romano .

arts.ttl: Man City eye Wirtz as De Bruyne replacement - Sunday's gossip
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz is wanted by Manchester City, Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta is the subject of a transfer battle, Aston Villa get a boost in their pursuit of Chelsea's Noni Madueke, plus more.

arts.ttl: Papers: Man City target Wirtz as De Bruyne replacement
arts.sum: The top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's newspapers...

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso: “Our game wasn't the best”
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen’s late win in Heidenheim pleased Xabi Alonso despite a poor performance.

arts.ttl: Late Leverkusen strike again in Heidenheim
arts.sum: Days after missing out on a cup final, Bayer Leverkusen produced yet another lackluster performance before Emi Buendía saved the day.

arts.ttl: Emi Buendía’s added-time goal earns Bayer Leverkusen victory at Heidenheim
arts.sum: Super-sub Emi Buendía struck a 91st-minute winner as Bayer Leverkusen snatched victory away at Heidenheim to keep within six points of Bayern Munich in the Bundesliga title race. Adrian Beck had a golden opportunity to give Heidenheim the lead in the 11th minute, but his shot went agonisingly wide with only Lukáš Hrádecký to beat.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold replacement: Conor Bradley, Jeremie Frimpong assessed as Liverpool transfer rumours swirl
arts.sum: The likely exit of Trent Alexander-Arnold to Real Madrid has led to speculation that Liverpool could look to sign Bayer Leverkusen wing-back Jeremie Frimpong.

arts.ttl: Saturday's Bundesliga predictions including Heidenheim vs. Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Heidenheim vs. Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso to have limited say in Real Madrid transfers
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen manager Xabi Alonso does appear to be a Real Madrid manager in waiting, with most considering it a question of when rather than if. The Basque coach has been hotly tipped to take over from Carlo Ancelotti, and has been in contact with Los Blancos in recent months. Ancelotti’s future remains in the […] The post Xabi Alonso to have limited say in Real Madrid transfers appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen duo closing in on their return to the pitch
arts.sum: Two important Leverkusen players are nearly ready to return to Leverkusen's squad selection - one could even make his comeback against Heidenheim this weekend!
